name: 4 Civilizations
description:
4 Civilizations is an indie game. It brings you back to early civilization times and lets you control the destiny of your civilization. You will compete with 3 other civilizations in the game. You will need to gather resources to advance in science and upgrade your buildings.
5 Main resources:

-Wood
-Stone
-Food
-Iron
-Science

You can Win the Game In 3 Different Ways

-Domination victory
Defeat all other civilizations to win the game

-Pacifist victory
Make peace with all civilizations without attacking anybody

-Science victory
Build a Ship first and sail to explore the world!

To win the game you have to win faster than other civilizations

Achievements and Leaderboards in The Game
Compete with other steam players.
